response.original_title: Atrophy and the Fear of Fading
response.overview: Dance, imagery, poetry and music as metaphors for the history of a country: its movements struggling for freedom and its heritage are brilliantly brought into dialogue through a fascinating kaleidoscope that blends archive images and contemporary performance. A work under the banner of modernity in its form and in its questioning: is the body of an individual similar to that of a country?

production_companies.name: Big Fish School of Digital Filmmaking

response.title: Atrophy and the Fear of Fading
